org.springframework.security.oauth.provider.filter

类 UnauthenticatedRequestTokenProcessingFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.security.oauth.provider.filter.OAuthProviderProcessingFilter
      • org.springframework.security.oauth.provider.filter.UnauthenticatedRequestTokenProcessingFilter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    javax.servlet.Filter, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.context.MessageSourceAware

    public class UnauthenticatedRequestTokenProcessingFilter
extends OAuthProviderProcessingFilter
    Processing filter for handling a request for an OAuth token. The default implementation assumes a request for a new unauthenticated request token. The default processes URL is "/oauth_request_token".
    作者:
    Ryan Heaton, Andrew McCall

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 org.springframework.security.oauth.provider.filter.OAuthProviderProcessingFilter

      • onValidSignature

        protected void onValidSignature(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                javax.servlet.FilterChain chain)
                         throws IOException
        从类复制的说明: OAuthProviderProcessingFilter
        Logic executed on valid signature. The security context can be assumed to hold a verified, authenticated ConsumerAuthentication Default implementation continues the chain.
        指定者:
        onValidSignature 在类中 OAuthProviderProcessingFilter
        参数:
        request - The request.
        response - The response
        chain - The filter chain.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • onNewTimestamp

        protected void onNewTimestamp()
                       throws org.springframework.security.core.AuthenticationException
        从类复制的说明: OAuthProviderProcessingFilter
        Logic to be performed on a new timestamp. The default behavior expects that the timestamp should not be new.
        覆盖:
        onNewTimestamp 在类中 OAuthProviderProcessingFilter
        抛出:
        org.springframework.security.core.AuthenticationException - If the timestamp shouldn't be new.
